name: Potion
effect: Heal 20 damage from 1 of your Pokémon.

name: X Speed
effect: During this turn, the Retreat Cost of your Active Pokémon is 1 less.

name: Pokédex
effect: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck.

name: Poké Ball
effect: Put a random Basic Pokémon from your deck into your hand.

name: Red Card
effect: Your opponent shuffles their hand into their deck and draws 3 cards.

name: Pokédex
effect: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck.

name: Pikachu
description: When it is angered, it immediately discharges the energy stored in the pouches in its cheeks.

name: Mewtwo
description: It was created by a scientist after years of horrific gene-splicing and DNA-engineering experiments.

attacks.name: Power Blast
attacks.effect: Discard 2 Psychic Energy from this Pokémon.

name: Chansey
description: This kindly Pokémon lays highly nutritious eggs and shares them with injured Pokémon or people.

name: Meowth
description: All it does is sleep during the daytime. At night, it patrols its territory with its eyes aglow.

attacks.name: Pay Day
attacks.effect: Draw a card.

name: Butterfree
description: In battle, it flaps its wings at great speed to release highly toxic dust into the air.

abilities.name: Powder Heal
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may heal 20 damage from each of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Bubble Drain
attacks.effect: Heal 20 damage from this Pokémon.

name: Pikachu
description: When it is angered, it immediately discharges the energy stored in the pouches in its cheeks.

name: Clefairy
description: It is said that happiness will come to those who see a gathering of Clefairy dancing under a full moon.

name: Mankey
description: It lives in groups in the treetops. If it loses sight of its group, it becomes infuriated by its loneliness.

attacks.name: Reckless Charge
attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 10 damage to itself.

name: Venusaur
description: Its plant blooms when it is absorbing solar energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight.

attacks.name: Mega Drain
attacks.effect: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

name: Greninja
description: It creates throwing stars out of compressed water.  When it spins them and throws them at high speed,  these stars can split metal in two.

abilities.name: Water Shuriken
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may do 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

name: Haunter
description: It likes to lurk in the dark and tap shoulders with a gaseous hand. Its touch causes endless shuddering.

attacks.name: Surprise Attack
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Onix
description: As it digs through the ground, it absorbs many hard objects. This is what makes its body so solid.

name: Jigglypuff
description: When its huge eyes waver, it sings a mysteriously soothing melody that lulls its enemies to sleep.

attacks.name: Sing
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

name: Bulbasaur
description: There is a plant seed on its back right from the day this Pokémon is born. The seed slowly grows larger.

name: Magnemite
description: The electromagnetic waves emitted by the units at the sides of its head expel antigravity, which allows it to float.

attacks.name: Inferno Dance
attacks.effect: Flip 3 coins. Take an amount of Fire Energy from your Energy Zone equal to the number of heads and attach it to your Benched Fire Pokémon in any way you like.

name: Pikachu
description: When it is angered, it immediately discharges the energy stored in the pouches in its cheeks.

name: Snivy
description: Being exposed to sunlight makes its movements swifter. It uses vines more adeptly than its hands.

name: Volcarona
description: Its burning body causes it to be unpopular in hot parts of the world, but in cold ones, Volcarona is revered as an embodiment of the sun.

attacks.name: Volcanic Ash
attacks.effect: Discard 2 Fire Energy from this Pokémon. This attack does 80 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

name: Blastoise
description: It crushes its foe under its heavy body to cause fainting. In a pinch, it will withdraw inside its shell.

attacks.name: Hydro Pump
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon has at least 2 extra Water Energy attached, this attack does 60 more damage.

name: Eevee
description: Its ability to evolve into many forms allows it to adapt smoothly and perfectly to any environment.

attacks.name: Growl
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, attacks used by the Defending Pokémon do −20 damage.

name: Cinccino
description: Its body secretes oil that this Pokémon spreads over its nest as a coating to protect it from dust. Cinccino won't tolerate even a speck of the stuff.

attacks.name: Do the Wave
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 damage for each of your Benched Pokémon.

name: Charmander
description: It has a preference for hot things. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.

attacks.name: Ember
attacks.effect: Discard a Fire Energy from this Pokémon.

name: Squirtle
description: When it retracts its long neck into its shell, it squirts out water with vigorous force.

name: Piplup
description: It doesn't like to be taken care of. It's difficult to bond with since it won't listen to its Trainer.

attacks.name: Nap
attacks.effect: Heal 20 damage from this Pokémon.

name: Turtwig
description: It uses its whole body to photosynthesize when exposed to sunlight. Its shell is made from hardened soil.

name: Electivire
description: The amount of electrical energy this Pokémon produces is proportional to the rate of its pulse. The voltage jumps while Electivire is battling.

attacks.name: Exciting Voltage
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon has at least 2 extra Lightning Energy attached, this attack does 80 more damage.

abilities.name: Lunar Plumage
abilities.effect: Whenever you attach a Psychic Energy from your Energy Zone to this Pokémon, heal 20 damage from this Pokémon.

name: Misdreavus
description: This Pokémon startles people in the middle of the night. It gathers fear as its energy.

attacks.name: Confuse Ray
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

name: Skarmory
description: People fashion swords from Skarmory's shed feathers, so this Pokémon is a popular element in heraldic designs.

attacks.name: Metal Arms
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon has a Pokémon Tool attached, this attack does 30 more damage.

name: Chimchar
description: Its fiery rear end is fueled by gas made in its belly. Even rain can't extinguish the fire.

name: Togepi
description: The shell seems to be filled with joy. It is said that it will share good luck when treated kindly.

abilities.name: Nightmare Aura
abilities.effect: Whenever you attach a [Darkness] Energy from your Energy Zone to this Pokémon, do 20 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Cherrim
description: After absorbing plenty of sunlight, Cherrim takes this form. It's full of energy while it's like this, and its liveliness will go on until sundown.

attacks.name: Leech Seed
attacks.effect: Heal 20 damage from this Pokémon.

name: Raichu
description: Its tail discharges electricity into the ground, protecting it from getting shocked.

abilities.name: Resilience Link
abilities.effect: If you have Arceus or Arceus ex in play, this Pokémon takes −30 damage from attacks.

attacks.name: Spark
attacks.effect: This attack also does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

name: Nosepass
description: It moves less than an inch a year, but when it's in a jam, it will spin and drill down into the ground in a split second.

attacks.name: Iron Defense
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks.

name: Gible
description: It skulks in caves, and when prey or an enemy passes by, it leaps out and chomps them. The force of its attack sometimes chips its teeth.

name: Staraptor
description: When Staravia evolve into Staraptor, they leave the flock to live alone. They have sturdy wings.

abilities.name: Defensive Whirlwind
abilities.effect: This Pokémon takes −30 damage from attacks from  Pokémon.

name: Manaphy
description: It is born with a wondrous power that lets it bond with any kind of Pokémon.

attacks.name: Oceanic Gift
attacks.effect: Choose 2 of your Benched Pokémon. For each of those Pokémon, take a [Water] Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to that Pokémon.

name: Snorlax
description: It is not satisfied unless it eats over 880 pounds of food every day. When it is done eating, it goes promptly to sleep.

attacks.name: Collapse
attacks.effect: This Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Psydrive
attacks.effect: Discard 2 [Psychic] Energy from this Pokémon.

name: Cyclizar
description: Apparently Cyclizar has been allowing people to ride on its back since ancient times. Depictions of this have been found in 10,000-year-old murals.

attacks.name: Overacceleration
attacks.effect: During your next turn, this Pokémon’s Overacceleration attack does +20 damage.

name: Sprigatito
description: Its fluffy fur is similar in composition to plants. This Pokémon frequently washes its face to keep it from drying out.

attacks.name: Cry for Help
attacks.effect: Put 1 random [Grass] Pokémon from your deck into your hand.

name: Floatzel
description: With its flotation sac inflated, it can carry people on its back. It deflates the sac before it dives.

attacks.name: Attack the Wound
attacks.effect: If your opponent’s Active Pokémon has damage on it, this attack does 60 more damage.

name: Pawmot
description: This Pokémon normally is slow to react, but once it enters battle, it will strike down its enemies with lightning-fast movements.

abilities.name: Counterattack
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot and is damaged by an attack from your opponent's Pokémon, do 20 damage to the Attacking Pokémon.

name: Machamp
description: It quickly swings its four arms to rock its opponents with ceaseless punches and chops from all angles.

attacks.name: Power Press
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon has at least 2 extra [Fighting] Energy attached, this attack does 50 more damage.

name: Ekans
description: By dislocating its jaw, it can swallow prey larger than itself. After a meal, it curls up and rests.

attacks.name: Poison Sting
attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

name: Bidoof
description: With nerves of steel, nothing can perturb it. It is more agile and active than it appears.

name: Pachirisu
description: It’s one of the kinds of Pokémon with electric cheek pouches. It shoots charges from its tail.

attacks.name: Plasma
attacks.effect: Take a [Lightning] Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to 1 of your Benched [Lightning] Pokémon.

name: Riolu
description: They communicate with one another using their auras. They are able to run all through the night.

name: Exeggcute
description: Though it may look like it's just a bunch of eggs, it's a proper Pokémon. Exeggcute communicates with others of its kind via telepathy, apparently.

attacks.name: Growth Spurt
attacks.effect: Take a  Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to this Pokémon.

name: Froakie
description: It secretes flexible bubbles from its chest and back. The bubbles reduce the damage it would otherwise take when attacked.

name: Farfetch'd
description: The stalk this Pokémon carries in its wings serves as a sword to cut down opponents. In a dire situation, the stalk can also serve as food.

name: Rayquaza
description: It lives in the ozone layer far above the clouds and cannot be seen from the ground.

attacks.name: Spiral Rush
attacks.effect: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 30 more damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Draco Meteor
attacks.effect: 1 of your opponent's Pokémon is chosen at random 4 times. For each time a Pokémon was chosen, do 40 damage to it.

attacks.name: Draco Meteor
attacks.effect: 1 of your opponent's Pokémon is chosen at random 4 times. For each time a Pokémon was chosen, do 40 damage to it.

name: Mimikyu
description: This Pokémon lives in dark places untouched by sunlight. When it appears before humans, it hides itself under a cloth that resembles a Pikachu.

attacks.name: Shadow Hit
attacks.effect: This attack also does 20 damage to 1 of your Pokémon.

name: Cosmog
description: Even though its helpless, gaseous body can be blown away by the slightest breeze, it doesn't seem to care.

attacks.name: Teleport
attacks.effect: Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

name: Lycanroc
description: Lycanroc attacks its prey with its sharp claws and fangs. It loyally obeys the instructions of a Trainer it trusts.

attacks.name: Crunch
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, discard a random Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Alolan Exeggutor
description: Blazing sunlight has brought out the true form and powers of this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Tropical Hammer
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Alolan Ninetales
description: A deity resides in the snowy mountains where this Pokémon lives. In ancient times, it was worshiped as that deity's incarnation.

attacks.name: Blizzard
attacks.effect: This attack also does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

name: Crabrawler
description: This Pokémon punches trees and eats the berries that drop down, training itself and getting food at the same time.

name: Alolan Grimer
description: There are a hundred or so of them living in Alola's waste-disposal site. They're all hard workers who eat a lot of trash.

attacks.name: Poison Gas
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

name: Toucannon
description: They smack beaks with others of their kind to communicate. The strength and number of hits tell each other how they feel.

attacks.name: Beak Blast
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.
